main.name: Michael Bartolotto
main.description: I am a Woodbridge based software engineer that is hardworking and steadfast. I have experience in Python, Java, C++, MATLAB, and GitHub.
main.bio: Hi, I'm Michael Bartolotto! I'm a rising third year Computer Science major at the University of Virginia, who is interested about learning more in cybersecurity and computer science.
main.contactmessage: If you want to get in contact with me, feel free! Below are the best ways to contact me.
